text:
<@U6MHBFW1K> No, I'm not stuck with the auth URL. I can install the app currently. but I am not getting my required scopes for using media bridge.
Can you please help me with the media bridge OAuth scopes.
can you share an example of the auth URL you’re using?
Does anyone know if it is possible to check the template name from a module? I have 2 page templates (Tertiary and Secondary) and I want to render a wrapper div on Secondary, but not on the other.

<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=cdb8fa00-b825-47ec-8957-a7a2639177ae&redirect_uri=https://hs-app-auth.catapult.app/media/bridge/callback&scope=contacts%20content%20timeline%20files|https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=cdb8fa00-b825-47ec-8957-a7a2639177[…]a/bridge/callback&scope=contacts%20content%20timeline%20files>
This is my current auth url.
